attributes.action: Move Gay Pride March in London from July 7th 2012
attributes.additional_details:
July 7th is the anniversary of the London Bombings in 2005. A total of 56 people were killed and over 700 injured, maimed and disabled for life.

There is to be a Gay Pride March through London on the same day in the very area where so many peoples loved ones died or had their lives changed forever.

Please ask the Government to prohibit this march and any other marches on this date and keep July 7th as a day of mourning. Thank you.
